permissions: Admins can update lineups. Non-admins can update lineups for a customer if they are a customer manager for that customer (considering broker context) or if they manage laborers on job production plans tied to the lineup.
validation_notes: The lineup ID argument is required. At least one of --name, --start-at-min, or --start-at-max must be provided. start-at-min/start-at-max must be ISO 8601 timestamps. start-at-max must be after start-at-min. A customer cannot have an overlapping lineup with the same name (case-insensitive); unnamed lineups also cannot overlap within the same time range. Customer relationship is create-only and cannot be changed after creation.
